about_the_game:
Descenso is a charming platformer that, while basic and short, delivers an entertaining and rewarding experience. In this adventure, you'll take on the role of a robot, accompanied by your trusty drone assistant, as you explore a mysterious world filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Throughout your journey, you'll encounter unique characters and challenges that will test your skills. Though the game is brief in length, every moment is crafted to provide a complete and satisfying experience. Descenso blends classic platforming elements with a simple yet effective narrative that will keep you intrigued until the very end.

As this is my first video game, I've poured a lot of effort and passion into its development, and I hope you'll enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed creating it. Descenso is perfect for those seeking a quick but captivating adventure, where every corner hides a new surprise. Embark on this short yet thrilling journey and uncover the secrets that lie within this enigmatic world!
